name: pixelfed
description: Pixelfed is a federated photo-sharing platform similar to Instagram. It supports albums, Stories, ActivityPub federation, and focuses on privacy and decentralization.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and share photos with followers in a timeline feed similar to Instagram

features.title: Albums And Collections
features.description: Organize photos into albums for better content management and presentation

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Set post visibility to public, followers-only, or unlisted for granular content control

features.title: Filters And Editing
features.description: Apply filters and basic edits to photos before posting directly in the interface

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Find and follow hashtags to discover content and connect with communities
